title: Bloomberg Markets: Trump Bump Benefits Endowments
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Trump Bump Benefits Endowments
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Janet Lorin Higher Education Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing how U.S. college endowments rebounded in fiscal 2017 from their worst annual decline since the 2009 recession, fueled by a stock market rally that accelerated after Donald Trump’s surprise victory.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
